sentences.en: ANTENATAL DIAGNOSIS OF FETAL DEFORMITY BY ULTRASONOGRAPHY ( REPORT OF 50 CASES )
sentences.cn: 胎儿畸形的产前超声诊断 ( 附50例病例分析 )

sentences.en: Any deformity frightened and repelled her.
sentences.cn: 任何畸形都使她害怕和反感.

sentences.en: But we cannot use money to compensate their physical deformity.
sentences.cn: 但是我们却不能用钱来弥补她们身体上的残缺.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Deformity of fetal external ear can be diagnosed by ultrasonography.
sentences.cn: 结论: 超声显像对胎儿外耳发育状态的检测,能够产前诊断胎儿外耳发育畸形.

sentences.en: Drugs taken during pregnancy may cause physical deformity in babies.
sentences.cn: 妊娠期服用的药物可能引起婴儿身体畸形。

sentences.en: Good technique in medicine and surgery means less disease and less deformity.
sentences.cn: 好的内外科技术能减少疾病和残废.

sentences.en: He did not like anyone to mention the deformity.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢人家提到他的缺陷.

sentences.en: He's very attractive in spite of his slight deformity.
sentences.cn: 尽管稍有残疾,但他仍很吸引人.

sentences.en: His deformity totally disabled him from following his vocation.
sentences.cn: 他的残疾使他完全失去了从事他的职业的能力.

sentences.en: Methods: Analyzed the status of 49 fetal congenital deformity retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法: 回顾分析49例先天性胎儿畸形情况.

sentences.en: Recovery with disabled eyesight is mainly aimed at acquired eyesight deformity obstacle.
sentences.cn: 视力残疾的恢复主要是针对后天发生的视力残疾障碍.

sentences.en: Simply pulling the wound edges together with skin hooks reproduces the ultimate deformity.
sentences.cn: 如用皮肤钩简单地把伤口边缘拉在一起,即可产生最终的畸形.

sentences.en: The basic deformity is a lack of development of the antihelix.
sentences.cn: 主要的畸形为对耳轮未发育.

sentences.en: The bones begin to grind against each other, leading to pain and deformity.
sentences.cn: 这些骨头开始互相挤压，造成疼痛和畸形。

sentences.en: The small chin deformity was a commen developmental deformity of the jaw.
sentences.cn: 小颏畸形是一种常见的颌骨发育性畸形.

words.tran_cn: 使...残缺，使...变形（deform的过去式和过去分词形式）
[医]畸形；畸形的人或物；道德方面的缺陷

trans.tran_cn: 畸形的人（或物），畸形状态，（道德等方面的）缺陷，畸形（或残缺）的部分
trans.tran_en: a condition in which part of someone’s body is not the normal shape
